member.name: M:MR.Gestures.Android.AndroidGestureHandler.AddGestureRecognizers(MR.Gestures.IGestureAwareControl,Android.Views.View)
member.summary: Adds the gesture recognizers to a View. Must be called from the Cell renderers GetCellCore method.

member.name: M:MR.Gestures.Android.AndroidGestureHandler.RemoveInstance(MR.Gestures.IGestureAwareControl)
member.summary: Removes the gesture recognizers for the given IGestureAwareControl. Called from a Views Dispose method.

member.name: M:MR.Gestures.Android.AndroidGestureHandler.OnElementChanged(MR.Gestures.IGestureAwareControl,MR.Gestures.IGestureAwareControl,Android.Views.View)
member.summary: Called from a View renderers OnElementChanged method.

member.name: M:MR.Gestures.Android.AndroidGestureHandler.OnElementPropertyChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs,Android.Views.View)
member.summary: Called from a View renderers OnElementPropertyChanged method. (not used on Android currently, but maybe in the future)

member.name: M:MR.Gestures.Android.AndroidGestureHandler.HandleMotionEvent(MR.Gestures.IGestureAwareControl,Android.Views.MotionEvent)
member.summary: Is called from the renderers DispatchTouchEvent method.

member.name: T:MR.Gestures.Android.DIP
member.summary: Calculator to help calculate Device Independant Pixels to real pixels.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.Android.Settings.LicenseKey
member.summary: Set the LicenseKey to the key you got when you purchased a license for this app. The license key varies with the app name.

member.name: P:MR.Gestures.Android.Settings.SwipeVelocityThreshold
member.summary: The velocity of a lifted finger relative to the ScaledMaximumFlingVelocity must be at least this value to count as Swipe. The default value is 0.1. Set it to a higher value if you want the user to move faster.
member.remarks: The value must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
